title: Cant get steady FPS
body:
I have noticed that since I got my computer i cant keep a steady FPS. It doesn't matter if i have the graphics set to low or high, i notice it at all settings. While i'm playing the game feels and looks like it is stuttering for me. I'm not sure if this would have anything to do with my monitor refresh rate?
My specs:
Monitor is Asus ROG PG248Q - Set to 180 hz
gtx 1070
I7-6700k
16 gb of ram

replies.body: I did a quick search and it looks like that monitor _is_ capable of 180 hz, but let's try tuning that down to 120 hz to see if that helps first! If that doesn't seem to help at all, check out the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover all your bases.
